thread.title: Even in the White House, can't escape Hillary Clinton
thread.title_full: Even in the White House, Trump can't escape Hillary Clinton

author: Marcus Gilmer
title: Even in the White House, can't escape Hillary Clinton
text:
Donald Trump's weird week just got weirder as he strolled out to surprise a White House tour group only to make his grand entrance in front of a portrait of former first lady and his 2016 rival Hillary Clinton.
SEE ALSO: Looks like Hillary Clinton and the internet are on the same page about this Mike Pence email thing 
Trump casually walked out to cheers and screams, seemingly oblivious to the painting of Clinton behind him, a specter staring down from the wall behind as if to remind him and everybody there, "You lost the popular vote." The painting is Clinton's official White House portrait from her time as first lady.
Trump just surprised visitors on a White House tour. Crowd loved it. Notice the wall behind him. pic.twitter.com/iogSRJGXJo 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) March 7, 2017 
Here's full video of the strange moment in all its awkward, symbolic glory.
Trump surprises visitors on a White House tour. The kids loved it. And Hillary Clinton smiled the entire time. pic.twitter.com/juRkpmzwBE 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) March 7, 2017 
Trump aide and Director of White House Message Strategy — how's that been going lately? — Cliff Sims posted the below video to Twitter, showing a different angle that's more akin to a WWE entrance (which Trump is, admittedly, used to). You can see Clinton still watching over the proceedings on the right
You never know what surprises may await you on a @WhiteHouse tour! pic.twitter.com/VNLpoXRZs4 
— Cliff Sims (@CSims45) March 7, 2017 
Also, props to the kid who casually walks up to the president when he's waved over like there aren't a dozen armed Secret Service agents ready to pounce. 
All told, this one small moment means nothing in the grand scheme of things other than to serve as a reminder that we've all fallen far down the rabbit hole into Alice's Wonderland and no amount of pills will make these fever dreams stop. 
BONUS: Obama's official White House photographer is Insta-trolling Trump
